text: Wait Until Dark is a suspense-thriller movie from 1967. Audrey Hepburn plays a blind woman who is terrorized by three criminals looking for a doll stuffed with heroin. The movie also stars Alan Arkin and Richard Crenna. Category:1967 thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Terence Young
title: Wait Until Dark
